DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigate metabolic effect standardize green tea extract , contain defined amount epigallocatechin-3-gallate ( EGCG ) , multiple sclerosis patient .
DOC.brief_title: Metabolic Effects Green Tea Extract Multiple Sclerosis Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients relapsingremitting multiple sclerosis stable treatment glatiramer acetate least 6 month prior inclusion Expanded disability status scale < 4.5 Normal weight , overweight Primary secondary progressive form multiple sclerosis Clinically relevant heart , lung , liver , kidney disease Habitual caffeine intake 300 mg per day Habitual consumption green tea Alcohol drug abuse
